fields.name: Rapid-Release Energy Gels
fields.description: Scientifically formulated with a 2:1 maltodextrin to fructose ratio for maximum carbohydrate absorption. These gels provide 22g of fast-acting fuel without the need for additional water.

fields.name: Advanced Energy Powder
fields.description: A high-calorie carbohydrate drink mix designed for events exceeding 2 hours. Contains essential electrolytes to maintain fluid balance while delivering steady energy.

fields.name: Endurance Energy Bars
fields.description: Made with natural oats and real fruit, providing a mix of complex and simple carbohydrates. Easy on the stomach during low-to-moderate intensity efforts.

fields.name: Pre-Race Energy Drinks
fields.description: The ultimate pre-workout booster. Combining caffeine and beta-alanine to sharpen focus and delay fatigue before you hit the start line.

fields.name: Precision Hydration Tabs
fields.description: Effervescent electrolyte tablets that turn any water bottle into a performance tool. Zero sugar, focusing purely on replacing Sodium, Magnesium, and Potassium.

fields.name: High-Sodium Electrolyte Powder
fields.description: Designed for heavy sweaters and ultra-endurance athletes. Pharmaceutical-grade powder for precise hydration management in extreme heat.

fields.name: Complete Recovery Protein
fields.description: A premium blend of whey protein isolate and fast-digesting carbohydrates. Fortified with L-Glutamine to support muscle repair immediately post-workout.

fields.name: Lab-Spec Shaker Bottle
fields.description: A 700ml BPA-free shaker with a leak-proof lid. Features a stainless steel mixing ball to ensure smooth, clump-free recovery shakes.

fields.name: Performance Multi-Vitamins
fields.description: Tailored for the metabolic demands of athletes. High doses of Vitamin D, B12, and Iron to support energy metabolism and immune function.

fields.name: Ultra-Pure Omega 3
fields.description: Triple-strength fish oil providing high levels of EPA and DHA. Essential for reducing systemic inflammation and supporting joint mobility.

fields.name: Biotin Complex
fields.description: Support for hair, skin, and connective tissue. Vital for long-term health when training load is high.

fields.name: Technical Lab Training Tee
fields.description: Ultra-breathable, moisture-wicking fabric with flat-lock seams to prevent chafing. Features subtle reflective detailing for safety.

fields.name: Pro-Vent Running Cap
fields.description: Lightweight, foldable cap with mesh ventilation. Designed to wick sweat while providing UPF 50 sun protection.

fields.name: Winter Beanie
fields.description: Thermal knit beanie for cold-weather training sessions. High-visibility logo for safety during dark winter miles.

fields.name: Rapid-Release Gel + Caffeine
fields.description: Our best-selling energy gel, now fortified with 75mg of caffeine to reduce perceived exertion and provide a mental edge. Contains the same 2:1 maltodextrin to fructose ratio for stomach comfort.
